verses.verse: Go to <WG33> <WG5720> now <WG3568>, ye rich men <WG4145>, weep <WG2799> <WG5657> and howl <WG3649> <WG5723> for <WG1909> your <WG5216> miseries <WG5004> that shall come upon <WG1904> <WG5740> you.
Your <WG5216> riches <WG4149> are corrupted <WG4595> <WG5754>, and <WG2532> your <WG5216> garments <WG2440> are <WG1096> <WG5754> motheaten <WG4598>.

Your <WG5216> gold <WG5557> and <WG2532> silver <WG696> is cankered <WG2728> <WG5769>; and <WG2532> the rust <WG2447> of them <WG846> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> a witness <WG3142> against <WG1519> you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> shall eat <WG5315> <WG5695> your <WG5216> flesh <WG4561> as it were <WG5613> fire <WG4442>. Ye have heaped treasure together <WG2343> <WG5656> for <WG1722> the last <WG2078> days <WG2250>.

Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the hire <WG3408> of the labourers <WG2040> who <WG3588> have reaped down <WG270> <WG5660> your <WG5216> fields <WG5561>, which <WG3588> is of <WG575> you <WG5216> kept back by fraud <WG650> <WG5772>, crieth <WG2896> <WG5719>: and <WG2532> the cries <WG995> of them which have reaped <WG2325> <WG5660> are entered <WG1525> <WG5754> into <WG1519> the ears <WG3775> of the YY <WG2962> TZva'ot <WG4519>.

Ye have lived in pleasure <WG5171> <WG5656> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> been wanton <WG4684> <WG5656>; ye have nourished <WG5142> <WG5656> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>, as <WG5613> in <WG1722> a day <WG2250> of slaughter <WG4967>.
Ye have condemned <WG2613> <WG5656> and killed <WG5407> <WG5656> the just <WG1342>; and he doth <WG498> not <WG3756> resist <WG498> <WG5731> you <WG5213>.

Be patient <WG3114> <WG5657> therefore <WG3767>, brethren <WG80>, unto <WG2193> the coming <WG3952> of the YY <WG2962>. Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the husbandman <WG1092> waiteth <WG1551> <WG5736> for the precious <WG5093> fruit <WG2590> of the earth <WG1093>, and hath long patience <WG3114> <WG5723> for <WG1909> it <WG846>, until <WG2193> <WG302> he receive <WG2983> <WG5632> the early <WG4406> and <WG2532> latter <WG3797> rain <WG5205>.

Be <WG3114> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> patient <WG3114> <WG5657>; stablish <WG4741> <WG5657> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>: for <WG3754> the coming <WG3952> of the YY <WG2962> draweth nigh <WG1448> <WG5758>.

Grudge <WG4727> <WG5720> not <WG3361> one against another <WG2596> <WG240>, brethren <WG80>, lest <WG3363> ye be condemned <WG2632> <WG5686>: behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the judge <WG2923> standeth <WG2476> <WG5707> before <WG4253> the door <WG2374>.

Take <WG2983> <WG5628>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, the prophets <WG4396>, who <WG3739> have spoken <WG2980> <WG5656> in the name <WG3686> of the YY <WG2962>, for an example <WG5262> of suffering affliction <WG2552>, and <WG2532> of patience <WG3115>.

Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, we count them happy <WG3106> <WG5719> which endure <WG5278> <WG5723>. Ye have heard <WG191> <WG5656> of the patience <WG5281> of I-yov <WG2492>, and <WG2532> have seen <WG1492> <WG5627> the end <WG5056> of the YY <WG2962>; that <WG3754> the YY <WG2962> is <WG2076> <WG5748> very pitiful <WG4184>, and <WG2532> of tender mercy <WG3629>.

But <WG1161> above <WG4253> all things <WG3956>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, swear <WG3660> <WG5720> not <WG3361>, neither <WG3383> by heaven <WG3772>, neither <WG3383> by the earth <WG1093>, neither <WG3383> by any <WG5100> other <WG243> oath <WG3727>: but <WG1161> let <WG2277> your <WG5216> yea <WG3483> be <WG2277> <WG5749> yea <WG3483>; and <WG2532> your nay <WG3756>, nay <WG3756>; lest <WG3363> ye fall <WG4098> <WG5632> into <WG1519> condemnation <WG5272>.

Is <WG2553> any <WG5100> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> afflicted <WG2553> <WG5719>? let him pray <WG4336> <WG5737>. Is <WG2114> any <WG5100> merry <WG2114> <WG5719>? let him sing psalms <WG5567> <WG5720>.

Is <WG770> any <WG5100> sick <WG770> <WG5719> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>? let him call <WG4341> <WG5663> for the elders <WG4245> of the Congregation <WG1577>; and <WG2532> let them pray <WG4336> <WG5663> over <WG1909> him <WG846>, anointing <WG218> <WG5660> him <WG846> with oil <WG1637> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the YY <WG2962>:

And <WG2532> the prayer <WG2171> of faith <WG4102> shall save <WG4982> <WG5692> the sick <WG2577> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> shall raise <WG1453> him <WG846> up <WG1453> <WG5692>; and if <WG2579> he have <WG5600> <WG5753> committed <WG4160> <WG5761> sins <WG266>, they shall be forgiven <WG863> <WG5701> him <WG846>.

Confess <WG1843> <WG5732> your faults <WG3900> one to another <WG240>, and <WG2532> pray <WG2172> <WG5737> one <WG240> for <WG5228> another <WG240>, that <WG3704> ye may be healed <WG2390> <WG5686>. The effectual fervent <WG1754> <WG5734> prayer <WG1162> of a righteous man <WG1342> availeth <WG2480> <WG5719> much <WG4183>.
